name: Boing & Bop
description:
Bunny brothers Boing and Bop were born to bounce! Navigate left and right as Bop to keep Boing in the air for as long as possible! Created in 36 hours for Wowie Jam 4.0 based on the theme “Collaborate With AI”.

THEME Boing chooses his next target semi-randomly according to recent bounces. Therefore, the player must “Collaborate With AI” by repositioning to keep Boing airborne!
CONTROLS

MOVE: A/D or Left/Right Arrow Keys (PC), Left Stick or D-Pad (Gamepad)
CHANGE DIFFICULTY: Q (PC), Select (Gamepad)

BUGS

The following issues have been documented and will be fixed in the post-jam release:

  • Bop's movement speed is inconsistent across resolutions
